case.state: I've really been looking forward to this!...
M-M-M-Megumin!!! What are you doing here?! I'm just here for research, I swear!
YunYun? How did you end up here!?
K-K-Kazuma! I can explain!
I'm sensing an incredible sadistic energy from this one!
You! I'm watching you! I won't fall to your corruption!
Ah, another fighter!
Hopefully they have more control over their magic than Megumin...
Such wonderful physical condition!
Another foul demon! Be wary, she may try to brainwash any weak willed and morally questionable people nearby!
Is this that game I've been hearing about?! That wonderful game where you all will make me do horrible, indecent things?! Er, I mean... I must put a stop to this!
It is my duty to put a stop to this shameful game by participating and beating you all in it! I must risk humiliation so that I might show you all the error of your ways!
All of these are terrible!
Hmm... let's do ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~...
I request ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~, dealer!
I require ~cards.text~ new ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~
Hm... Let's go with ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~...
~Cards.text~, please.
Hmm... ~cards.text~ more, please.
How about ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~...?
Let's try ~cards.text~.
Hmm... let's try ~cards.ifPlural(these|this)~ ~cards.ifPlural(ones|one)~.
I think I'll go with ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~...
I hope this is the right decision...
Maybe ~cards.ifPlural(these|this)~ ~cards.ifPlural(ones|one)~...
These cards are trying to punish me!
Hmm... it might take a lot to beat this hand...
Try your best to overpower this one.
This hand can really take a hit, just like me.
Let's see if you have what it takes to best this crusader!
You'll have to play dirty to beat me this round...
Here I stand, confident in my victory. It would be quite a shame if someone managed to best me...
I'm quite eager to see how you all will beat this one.
Curse my good fortune...
I won't fall here! You'll have to drag me down with you, where you doubtless have many perverse plans for me!
It feels quite wonderful, to be struggling with all my might... I won't lose here!
I can hardly wait to see what dirty tricks you'll resort to using to best this hand.
I must overcome this trial, I can't just fold and give in!
Don't think I'll go easy on you just because I'm enjoying this!
I-I'm fighting with all my might, despite everything being exposed! Th-This game is wonderful!
I can feel you all staring at my body like hungry wolves!
I-I imagine everyone is having countless depraved thoughts about me right now!
(P-Perhaps I should throw this hand... No! I must be utterly defeated! That would ruin the fun!)
T-This dealer is toying with me! I'm so close to winn- er, I mean losing!
This hand is quite ruthless, forcing me to endure this humiliation even longer...
Nagatoro, you seem quite adept at teasing and humiliating others. Th-That's quite an impressive talent.
The uncertainty of whether or not this is enough to pull through is quite exciting...
This could go either way, Perhaps Eris will grant me the luck I need.
I suppose I'll have to rely on using my body to deflect some of the blow from this round...
Did I make the right decision with those cards?...
I am quite uncertain how I will fare with this hand... It's very exciting!
I tried my best, I suppose we'll have to wait and see how this plays out...
I have no idea if I'll win this round, the anticipation is wonderful...
I feel like I'm being teased by these cards... I can't tell what they are going to do to me!
I fear this will not be enough to save me!
Don't worry about me, focus on protecting your own dignity.
(*pant* *pant*) This is getting dangerous!
Now would be a good opportunity to play some dirty trick and make me lose.
I'm so defenseless and vulnerable right now, like an adorable duxion surrounded by a swarm of ravenous one punch bears!
Even if I am shamefully exposed, I won't give in! You must completely dominate me in both body and mind!
This game is incredibly exciting!
I am a noble and proud crusader, if I lose here it will be incredibly shameful!
O-Oh no!... This is such a terrible hand!... I-I sure hope Nagatoro doesn't r-ridicule me for it... hahaha...
W-Whoops! Clumsy me! I gave away another good card, Nagatoro... I-Isn't that so pathetic?
*Guh!* I must stand strong and defend my purity!
I-I won't stand aside, even if the odds are against me! You'll have to run me over!
I won't falter, on my honor as a crusader!
I've taken worse hits than this, so don't hold back with your cards!
Now would be your chance to overpower my hand! What an unfortunate situation!
This humiliation... Are you sure I don't have to pay to participate in this?!
The dealer must be conspiring to see me undressed and trembling in defeat...
D-Dealer, is this some new kind of play?! I approve!
I have a feeling Kazuma would be exceptional at this game, considering all the luck involved...
I-I'm actually getting really close to being exposed... I can't let this hand hold me back...
P-Perhaps we could do arm wrestling instead?...
H-How about a competition of endurance instead? Or anything with less luck involved!
C-Could this be the end for me?...
I won't give in! Go ahead and trample over my hand with your big, strong legs!
There's no way I can win with this! I'm completely at your mercy!
This is an amazing game! I want to knight whoever invented it!
I-I'm not sure if I'm ready to expose myself just yet! My heart is pounding out of my chest!
I must pull myself together, just think what the others would say if I ended up exposed like this!
With this hand I could very well find myself forced to...!
A-Ah! I am about to be bested, and then forced to degrade myself in front of you all as you shamelessly watch with evil grins on your faces as you make horribly lewd plans for my body!
What are you even doing here, Megumin? I never would have suspected you had such a depraved side lurking beneath the surface!
I'm having trouble making eye contact with ~player~... They are really playing dirty, participating in such a game while only wearing that! *pant*
Don't worry about me, ~player~. Give it your all and don't hold back.
This isn't a common occurrence! I swear! I was just curious, is all...
I must admit, I am quite curious about your odd clothing, Meia.
I've never seen a creature as strange as you, Rainbow Dash. What exactly are you?
You remind me of someone, Natsuki. Except less dangerous.
I wonder if that succubus plans any foul or dirty tricks? Is she perhaps cheating? P-Playing dirty to get the upper hand over me?!...
You seem to have a well developed physique, Petra. I bet someone like you can take quite the hit!
Petra, your outfit gives the air of elite status. Are you perhaps a member of a royal guard or something of that nature?
I'm so glad this game hasn't ended too quickly. The longer the better!
I learned to play many games as a child, but they were all much more sophisticated than this one. It's nice to try something new for a change.
This is why I love bodysuits! despite still being completely covered, I feel so exposed and vulnerable! Every curve of my body is on display!
If anyone fears they may lose this hand, I will gladly stand in the way and take the blow for you! Wait, that's against the rules?... I see, I apologize...
I must protect my purity, however, can I really call myself a crusader if I force other women to strip instead?... This is quite the predicament...
O-Of course not! It would be unbecoming of me as a crusader to back out just because I took a hit! I can do this much!
S-Sadistic? I'll have you know I'm the very model of a just crusader!
S-Shame?! Y-Yes indeed it will be quite shameful indeed!... My dignity in tatters. And what's this soreness you speak of? My mind is racing with possibilities!
G-G-Gangbangs?... Used as meat?... W-What is this?!
Don't mind me, Dorothy, J-Just trying to... not lose control... This is all so wonderful...
What would you have me do, Dorothy? Or should I call you master?! If that bothers you feel free to punish me! (*pant*) (*pant*)
It appears I have been ruthlessly defeated! And now I must begin to shame myself in front of you all!
I s-suppose I have no choice.. Very well... if I must debase myself in front of you I will.
It would appear it is my turn... As a proud crusader I must uphold the terms of our agreement! There is absolutely no ulterior motive whatsoever!
With each loss I fall closer to public humiliation.... H-How awful...
I suppose I shall remove my armor next.
Making me remove yet another piece of clothing... what a diabolical game!
I'm running out of smaller things to remove! How exhilarating...
*pant* *pant* N-No, I'm not excited, I'm just.... anxious! Yes that's it!
I'm starting to feel a bit naked...
I-I must resist! Surely I have something else I can use...
This is starting to become dangerous!
I-I suppose I must try and protect my dignity!...
I-I only have two things left I can take off...
To think it has come to this...
I'm not sure my heart can take this...
I-It's finally come to this! I-I don't know if I can do this!
The ribbon is part of the body suit... so I'll have to remove the whole thing...
W-Well, it would seem this is it...
It seems I have nothing left now... This is the end of the road for me...
I've been consistently and mercilessly toyed with and humiliated this entire game...
And now I must utterly disgrace myself for your entertainment...
why is ~nude~ so far ahead of me?...
A-At least there's still a chance for me to catch up to the others...
H-How did I get so far behind everyone else! Th-This is impossible, I was supposed to be the one being humiliated!
I-I have no idea what you mean... Y-You foul... hah... sadistic woman!...
S-Stamping?... G-Get a hold of yourself Darkness...
S-Stamping?... G-Get a hold of yourself Darkness...
Fertile?! B-Being surrounded by men who want to... Stop I don't know if my imagination can take this!
Filthy little... (*pant*) Y-You may call me that as much as you want! A-And to think, being made to pay for... (*pant*) (*pant*)
Of course, I must resist and continue to fight on my honor as a crusader! I won't make this easy for you all, so don't hold back!
I can feel everyone's eyes on me... just waiting for me to lose each hand!
I must endue and hold my ground before my inevitable fall!
This is quite some game... I wonder if they would be willing to open an establishment in Belzerg...
Honestly, the very notion that I am looking forward to this... r-ridiculous!
I've worn this armor so often for a while now that I almost feel a bit naked without it... hehehe...
To think I have to expose my b-b-b-breasts!
It would not behoove a crusader to be excited about falling to their opponents and being toyed with and... *pant* *pant*
Even if these are simple arm guards, without them my upper torso feels completely exposed...
Right, I suppose I could let my hair down... that counts right?...
W-Without my skirt, I'll be p-practically nude in front of everyone!...
I must try to hold off a bit longer. I often keep my hair tied up so it doesn't get in my way while adventuring, however it will now serve as a shield!
I'm not delaying the inevitable to make my opponents more angry or sadistic, that would be ridiculous!
I-I'm down to my last line of defense...
To be reduced to just a thin fabric that clings to my body... The humiliation is almost unbearable!
After this, my nude form will be burned into the eyes of total strangers... People I don't know will see me at my most vulnerable... *pant*
But I can't back down now! No matter the damage this causes my reputation! Even if people look at me in the street and whisper and point at me... *pant*
Th-This is much more embarrassing than I ever could have imagined. It's incredibly thrilling...
My chest is going to be fully exposed! I-I'm being made to show off my chest to strangers!...
I-It seems from the state of these that I can no longer hide my arousal from everyone... Oh, Eris, I've never been so debased before!
I-I've been reduced to nothing more than a plaything for you all... *pant*
No matter, there are still plenty of opportunities to catch up...
Yes, that's right, it's not over yet. Focus on that.
I-I can't let this disgrace happen! I must not win this!
This line is a bug, please report it.
S-Steady yourself darkness... I-I can't fall this fast to her words...
I-I'm not sure what you are talking about! I'm not some depraved pervert who... who thinks of having herself trampled on and... and...
Y-Yes! A-Anything you say! I'll be a good girl! (*pant*) (*pant*) (*pant*)
Even if you must force me to submit, do whatever it takes!
Waiting in anticipation as I'm forced to expose more and more...!
I shudder to imagine what you all have planned once you expose me! *pant* *pant*
I bet Kazuma would frequent that place a lot...
Yes... completely ridiculous...
To think my chest will be exposed...
I can already feel everyone staring at them... H-How horrible! *pant*
I love this game!
Being laid bare in front of total strangers...
Good, now I should be able to participate in this wonderful humiliation play a bit longer!
You all will be able to see every part of my body... This must be the greatest day ever!
To fulfill your perverted desires you will have to take it out on me even more!
Now, p-please come at me with all you've got!
Such a thin veil is all that stands left between me and the lecherous people all around me! I've never been so happy!
And you are absolutely sure I don't have to pay for this experience, right?!
My body... fully and shamefully on display... I've truly died and gone to heaven!
Go ahead and mock me! P-Please don't hold back! *pant* Ridicule me if you must!
Only this thin strip of cloth is protecting my lower half... I've never felt more vulnerable in my life!
I-I can't stop you from looking or commenting about what a promiscuous woman I am, I can see you all thinking it! *pant*
Pl-Please ridicule me as much as you wish! I-I can feel myself being surrounded by eyes of disgust! *pant*
N-Nothing but an object for y-your viewing pleasure... O-Oh this is... I-I'm so happy right now!
If only luck weren't on my side right now...
I won't let it end this way!
Even if I must break the rules of reality itself!
This line is a bug, please report it
Ah! I see it's ~player~'s turn! I suppose I must watch closely to ensure no cheating occurs!
I-It's my duty to take one for the team, ~player~. Let me go in your stead!
I'm sure you plan on ordering me to strip instead if things start start taking a turn for the worse, right? Right?!
I see you plan to soil my purity by exposing yourself to me, but I will endure!
It's ~player~'s turn?... I-I see...
I have to admit, I never expected myself to be in a game like this. It's like a dream come true!
(*pant*) This denial is rather good as well...
I-I see. This is good too, I suppose...
Although I didn't lose, I suppose I can still enjoy this...
Making me strip halfway and then stop... I'm trembling in anticipation!
I must stay strong...
I'm definitely being tested right now...
(*pant*) I-I see it's ~player~'s turn now...
We're so close! Play dirty if you have to, ~player~!
Did you do that on purpose!? You must be forcing me to stand here like this to prolong my shame! (*pant*) (*pant*)
I always appreciate a good suit of armor. If I didn't go for the best, I'd have to replace it a lot more often.
*Hueh!* I'm sure he plans to whip it out first thing and force me to stare at it all game! How diabolical!
Forcing me to watch as you slowly strip down all your clothes, I never imagined this form of humiliation before! I have so much to learn!
(*pant*) (*pant*)
Feel free to get payback on me next round, ~name~.
If you want me to submit to you, you'll have to try harder than that!
I would prefer to lose while trying my best, but if you order me to I will gladly throw my next hand!
This is really getting me worked up...
You're supposed to punish someone before rewarding them...
Take a deep breath, Darkness, you can do this...
Come on, you need to try harder to beat me! P-Please?
Please try harder next time, my dignity depends on it.
I didn't really come here expecting to win against others...
I never thought being on the other side could be just as embarrassing...
I can only imagine the kind of thoughts going through your head right now, ~name~. I'm sure they must be more depraved than even I could imagine!
(*pant*) I'm sure you now have some underhanded tricks in store to ensure you beat me! (*pant*)
...and then you'll bend me on one knee and spank me for accidentally humiliating you in front of everyone...
...and then you will make me do even more indecent acts to make yourself feel better about losing this hand. A-And then...
You aren't supposed to be trying to join me!
H-Hang in there a little longer!
F-Forcing me to watch while I'm in this position... Amazing!
You must be desperate to pleasure yourself to my shameful display! Using my unfortunate position to your benefit!
Your lecherous mind must be seeking to expose yourself to me while I'm vulnerable like this!
F-Feel free to spit on me if I'm distracting you!
We could always end the game here, I mean, it's not like I want to be the only one humiliated or anything...
Having to just stand around here nude after all of that is pretty horrible as well...
Hang in there, no need to end the game just yet! You can keep making me stand here like this as long as needed!
Flashing me while I'm in this exposed state... how devious!
That could have been me... how lucky... (*sigh*)
D-Don't think you can tempt me, ~name~! I am a stalwart and pure maiden!
I won't be distracted by this little display, ~name~! I know what you are trying to do!
H-Hang in there! You can't lose this soon!
Feel free to go harder on me next time!
You must have something incredibly perverse in mind for me, ~name~! I can see it in your eyes! Something not even I could expect! (*pant*) How ruthless!
Isn't it thrilling to have all these strangers staring at you in anticipation, Megumin!
To be caught in a situation like this with someone I know... This is incredibly humiliating!
If you are feeling nervous, Megumin, feel free to request I lose on your behalf! I'd gladly help you out in a heartbeat!
You know, now that I think about it, I think you may have grown a little bit, Megumin.
If you are feeling nervous, Megumin, feel free to request I lose again on your behalf! I'd gladly help you out in a heartbeat!
So what are you choosing next Megumin?
T-Try to hang in there Megumin, I'm not sure I'm quite ready to see you wearing too much less!
At least you still have your undergarments.
I suppose this is it. Stay strong Megumin!
Ah! I see it is ~player~'s turn! I suppose I must watch closely to ensure no cheating occurs!
I-It's my duty to take one for the team, ~player~. Let me go in you're stead!
You have a predatory look about you, ~name~. I must be cautious around you!
I apologize, ~name~, that should have been me instead!
It's ~player~'s turn?... I-I see...
(*pant*) I bathe among other girls all the time, I wonder why this feels so different?
Being humiliated alongside other women... I never even considered this!
Although I didn't lose, I suppose I can still enjoy this...
S-Should I look? Would that be wrong?...
W-We must endure this shame together, ~name~! (*pant*) (*pant*)
(*pant*) I-I see it's ~player~'s turn now...
Being exposed like this, but having the attention diverted away from me as if I'm being ignored... (*pant*)
I was so close...
I'm sure you enjoy taking the attention away from me as I stand here, trembling in embarrassment... As if I'm not even worth everyone's time! (*pant*) You are far more experienced than I anticipated!
I feel as if I am being outmatched! How can I compete to this odd creature?!
D-Don't think you can tempt me, ~name~! I am a stalwart and pure maiden!
I wish we could trade places... Er, solely so I can shoulder your burden for you, of course!
I won't be distracted by this little display, ~name~! I know what you are trying to do!
You must enjoy making me flustered like this!
H-Hang in there! You can't lose this soon!
Forcing me to watch as you slowly strip down all your clothes, I never imagined this form of humiliation before! I have so much to learn!
Feel free to get payback on me next round, ~name~.
You'll have to try harder if you want to force me into submission, ~name~ !
Please, allow me to take the penalty instead! I insist!
I will protect you by taking the blows from here on out!
I would prefer to lose while trying my best, but if you order me to I will gladly throw my next hand!
Feel free to use me as a stepping stone for your victory next time, ~name~.
You can throw me under the wagon if you need to next time, ~name~, I won't think any less of you!
There's no need to be a hero, ~name~! Allow me to take the hit next time!
If you would prefer to not get your clothes dirty, feel free to use me as a living coat rack!
I bet you are planning on punishing me for beating you with this hand!
(*pant*) (*pant*) You must be planning to turn me into your pet, ~name~ ! I won't give in!
(*pant*) I barely escaped a humiliating defeat this time...
I have no doubt people will make up lewd rumors about me and treat me with disgust in the streets for standing around like this. Now I know how Kazuma feels...
...and then you order me to clean the floor beneath your feet for you and use myself like a living sponge, and then...
This is just taunting me for winning this hand!
Having attention slowly stolen from me as I'm made to do this... This must be some next level neglect play!
One by one we are being degraded!
I wish I could go through all of that again...
F-Feel free to look down on me for losing before you did!
You must think I'm pathetic for being bested by you!
Feel free to throw your clothes on me to cover my shame if you find me utterly and disgustingly indecent!
Being simply discarded and ignored now that I've fulfilled my purpose... P-Please keep going!
I can just pretend that's me instead...
I wish I could go through all of this again...
This game is a gift that just keeps giving!...
Perhaps you're in on this with everyone and you plan to watch me writhe in embarrassment, ~name~! You must intend to toy with me and break me! (*pant*) How ruthless!
W-Wait, who has to strip then?! I suppose if someone must, I will offer myself as tribute!
( I wish that were me instead... )
It may be small, but I have no complaints. You had to choose it eventually.
I would be a hypocrite if I complained, seeing as I myself brought a sword along.
You must have a plan to get me back, right? Right?!
Such a small trinket, that must be all you consider my body worth!
I-Is that it? Such a tease!
If you keep making choices like that, I have no chance! (*pant*) (*pant*)
I feel like you're teasing me.
You must be toying with me...
You must be trying to make me beg. How sadistic!
Choosing something so small while I'm so exposed... That's quite dirty!
I'm sure you're laughing inside at my pathetic state! (*pant*)
You probably plan to spread word about me and all the shameful things I've been made to do. I'm sure people will look at me like scum in the streets! (*pant*)
I truly didn't stand a chance in this!... It's almost as if it were rigged against me! I-I wouldn't mind if that were the case!
P-Please feel free to taunt me!
It's as if you are rubbing it in... *pant* *pant*
Yes! Feel free to stall as long as you wish!
It's as if you are taunting me!...
I approve of your decision!
Go ahead and take off even more, I won't fold no matter what you flaunt in front of me!
Now see if you can fare better with your next hand.
Let's see how you do next round.
(*ahem*) Shall we continue...?
Do you plan to tease me like this every round?
I must stand strong, I'm sure you will only get more merciless from here on out!
This game is really amazing!
I wonder how you plan to torture me next time...
I'm sure you plan to take revenge on me for losing this hand! Well, go ahead!
I'm sure I will remember this day for the rest of my life!
What did I do to deserve this!
Please, let us continue at once!
I-I must hang in there as long as possible!
And now the shame continues!...
I-I have to hang on!... N-Not yet!
The longer I have to stand here, the better!
I wish this could go on forever...
Feel free to put something back on if you wish, I wouldn't mind! Just imagining you taunting me as you blatantly cheat... (*pant*)
P-Perverted?! I am not perverted, Megumin! N-Not in the slightest!
I-I have plenty of shame, Megumin! What are you talking about?!
M-Most valuable party member?! While it may be true your explosions are impressive, Megumin, need I remind you that it is us who have to carry you every time you let one loose! ?
I must be strong...
I'm sure you have a plan to come back from this and humiliate me.
You must have a plan to get me back, right? Right?!
I would be a hypocrite if I complained, seeing as I myself brought a sword along.
Such a tease!

Such a small trinket, that must be all you consider my body worth!

The longer you hang in there, the longer my torment must continue, so please hold on!
G-Good choice! (*pant*)

I don't mind if you keep the game going, please I insist!
A sound tactical choice!
To be told off by Megumin like that in front of all these strangers... ehehehehe...
Comparing me to Kazuma like that... *pant* How disgraceful!
I-I was doing no such thing, Megumin! I'm merely a proud Crusader! It is our calling to throw ourselves into a hail of fists and stomping feet to protect our friends!
Go ahead and take off even more, I won't fold no matter what you flaunt in front of me!
Feel free to use me for your benefit if needed, ~name~. I'll gladly take your place if I must!
Let us continue to endure this humiliation in mutual solidarity!
(*ahem*) Shall we continue?...
Do you plan to toy with me like this every round?
I must stand strong, I'm sure you will only get more merciless from here on out!
This game is really amazing!
I wonder how you plan to torture me next time...
I'm sure you plan to take revenge on me for losing this hand! Well, go ahead!
I'm sure I will remember this day for the rest of my life!
What did I do to deserve this!
Please, let us continue at once!
N-Next time you may not be so lucky... F-Fight as hard as you can! (*pant*)
Y-Yes! Let the game continue!
F-Feel free to take it off slower next time, you can prolong the game!
Now then...
Let's continue.
I wonder who will lose the next hand...
Your distractions are pointless, ~name~!
Is this disappointment that I'm feeling? How shameful!
You must resist his charm, Darkness!
You must by toying with me, I know it!
Your plan to corrupt me won't work!...
To toy with a pure maiden like this, you must have a stone cold heart!
Is that all you think my dignity is worth? (*pant*) (*pant*)
I'm sure you brought all these small articles of clothing just so you could be at an advantage over me!
I can feel myself slowly being corrupted! Was this your plan all along?!
When this is over you'll order me to pick up everything you've strewn about the ground, right?!

I'm sure you c-could find something that's smaller...

I-If you keep looking I'm sure there is something smaller you could choose! E-Even if you have to bend the rules!

I don't mind this either, but feel free to ridicule me while you are at it...
I see, that would probably be your best choice to keep this going.
I'm a proud and noble crusader. I won't be so easy to dominate!
I would bring shame to my family if they found out about this...
I'm positive you have much worse in store for me, ~name~ , but I won't budge!
You must intend to turn me into your plaything after this, right?!
Were you sent by a general of the Demon King to slowly break my spirit?!
(*pant*) (*pant*) You are making a fool out of me in front of all these people!
I'm so glad I came to this game!
I feel honored to be able to participate in this game!
Hurry, onto the next round!
What a wonderful experience this is!
I feel I must personally thank whoever invented this game!
B-Be more careful next hand!
If I sound too desperate, feel free to insult me for it!
I-I need to last as long as I can!
W-Well then...
